story-texts.text: You start awake, with only a flame clinging to a stonewall to provide light.Registering the cold, you find yourself sitting against a bare stonewall and floor, at the end of a passage. You try to collect your thoughts but cant remember anything, your mind goes blank eveytime you try to recall any memory. You stand up and notice a glint of something at the end of the light's reach. You stand up and grab the torch.
Upon inspecting the object you find out it's a lockpick and torque wrench

options.text: Take the lockpick, might come in handy.
Ignore the lockpick and start walking.

story-texts.text: After a few minutes of walking, you notice a door coming up ahead to the right of the passage.
Nourished after eating you carry on walking

skills.name: Sneak
skills.description: Allows you to remain undetected while traversing

skills.name: Tracking
skills.description: Allows you to make the correct choice of path, locate a person or object and read footprints or tracks.

skills.name: Sixth-sense
skills.description: Will warn of imminent danger, can also give insight to a person or object's true purpose.

skills.name: Camouflage
skills.description: Allows you to blend in with your surroundings. In cities or towns, it allows you to look and sound like a native.

abilities.name: Replicate
abilities.description: Create free thinking clones of yourself

abilities.name: Spatial Gate
abilities.description: Teleport to any previously visited locations

abilities.name: Spatial Dash
abilities.description: Teleport to a location within set, within a range

abilities.name: Illusion Weaving
abilities.description: Allows you to target 1 or all five senses and deploy false sensations to a targeted being.

abilities.name: Mimicry
abilities.description: Allows you to mimic sound or a physical form, from past experience

abilities.name: Aero Control
abilities.description: Allows you to manipulate the air around you or enemies

abilities.name: Flame Generation
abilities.description: Allows you to create fire out of nothing.

abilities.name: Earth Generation
abilities.description: Allows you to create rock from nothing.

abilities.name: Aqua Generation
abilities.description: Allows you to create water from nothing.
